SharedRegions

Class ArrivalLounge

  • java.lang.Object
    • SharedRegions.ArrivalLounge

  • public class ArrivalLounge
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Arrival Lounge shared region. This is where the passengers arrive when the plane lands and the porter is waiting for collecting bags.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArrivalLounge(MemStack<Bag>[] sBags, int[] numOfBagsPerFlight, char[][] tripState, BaggageCollectionPoint bcp, Repo repo)
      Arrival Lounge's instanciation

        sBags - -> bags
        numOfBagsPerFlight - -> number of bags per flight
        tripState - -> trip states for the passengers
        bcp - -> baggage collection point

    • Method Detail

      • takeARest

        public char takeARest()
        The porter is taking a rest, waiting for a plane to land.
        Returns:
        'E' end of the day

      • tryToCollectABag

        public Bag tryToCollectABag()
        The porter tries to collect a bag from the plane's hold.
        Returns:
        the bag that the porter has collected

      • noMoreBagsToCollect

        public void noMoreBagsToCollect()
        At the plane's hold, the porter realizes that he has no more bags to collect. It informs the baggage collection point that there are no more bags to collect.

      • whatShouldIDo

        public char whatShouldIDo(int flight)
        The porter is taking a rest, waiting for a plane to land.
        Parameters:
        flight - -> the flight number
        Returns:
        'T' if the passenger is going to take a bus (means he is in transit)

      • setEndOfWork

        public void setEndOfWork()
        Sets the porter's end of operations
